name: Winter (Jamming Games)
description:
Made for Mini Jam 87: BREAK 

https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-87-break

The game is about a plane crash (break) where the main character is a doctor and needs to scavenge supplies to help keep the other plane crash victims alive as long as possible (pacifism).

Unfortunately due to other obligations we could only spend ~24 hours on this jam so it's a little rushed and MVP-ish, but we are really happy with how it turned out!

Made by Soapy and kstzl

Music by Scott Buckley

All source and art is open source and available here: https://gitlab.com/game-jammers/winter

Raw art assets included in the downloads.
